mapper.insert: INSERT INTO evaluate ( patientid, doccode, testno, pjdate, content, deletion, tdpj, zdpj, openid, docname, hosdeptname, sex, clinicno, birthdate, idno, amorpm, cardname, name, regdate, regcode, registerfee, age, visitno, hosdocname) VALUES (#{patientid}, #{doccode}, #{testno}, #{pjdate}, #{content}, #{deletion}, #{tdpj}, #{zdpj},#{openid}, #{docname}, #{hosdeptname}, #{sex}, #{clinicno}, #{birthdate}, #{idno}, #{amorpm}, #{cardname}, #{name}, #{regdate}, #{regcode}, #{registerfee}, #{age}, #{visitno}, #{hosdocname})
mapper.select: select CONCAT(left(docname,1),'医师') as docnames,e.* from evaluate e where patientid=#{cardno} order by num desc LIMIT 0,#{size}
mapper.update: update evaluate set deletion='0' where patientid=#{patientid} and doccode=#{doccode} and pjdate=#{pjdate} and clinicno=#{clinicno}
